messages.title: What the press say about Dorothy...
messages.content: 'Dorothy is widely recognized for her 'no nonsense' style...'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to turn the Town Hall's under-used rooms into a business incubator for new start-up companies.
Dorothy will campaign for a directly elected Mayor for the region.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win here in Watford on 7th May

issues.economy: Dorothy is planning to turn the Town Hall's under-used rooms into a business incubator for new start-up companies.
issues.governance: Dorothy will campaign to have a directly elected Mayor for the region.

images.caption: Dorothy Thornhill with young people and supporters.
Graphs and statistics related to Watford election results.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet suggests tactical voting, indicating Labour can't win in Watford.
